title: Khtada River
whats_it_like: A classic North Coast hike in mission. Large bedrock slides and rapids in the rainforest.
scouting_portaging: All rapids can be easily scouted and portaged.

time.original: Day mission.  30 min paddle across Skeena, and a few hours each of hiking and paddling.

when_to_go: May/June for the main runoff season.  Responds well to rainfall.
